isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 8000 SERIES SPLASH PANELS

svcsubproc.title: 8100 Model Splash Panels - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 46 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Drill out the rivets (Item 1) attaching the hood/fender splash panel (Item 2) to the hood/fender assembly (Item 3) and remove it from the hood/fender assembly, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side hood/fender splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: 8100 Model Splash Panels - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 46 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the hood/fender splash panel (Item 2) on the hood/fender assembly (Item 3) and install the rivets (Item 1) attaching it to the hood/fender assembly, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side hood/fender splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: 8200 Model Splash Panels - Remove

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the support and tilt assist spring cable assemblies, then detach the tilt assist spring cable assembly as follows.
Refer to Figure 47 for items in parentheses.

step2.para: Remove the cotter pin (Item 1) (and washer, if so equipped) at the tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2) on the side of the radiator (Item 3), driver side shown.
Pull out the retaining pin (Item 4) that secures the tilt assist spring cable clevis (Item 5) to the tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2), driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove the passenger side tilt assist spring cable assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 47. 8200 Model Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. HEX BOLT, LOCKWASHER, AND FLAT WASHER (3/8-16 UNC)

step1.para: Unhook the tilt assist spring cable assembly (Item 1) from the hood tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2), save for reinstallation, passenger side shown.
Drill out the double row of rivets (Item 3) attaching the hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) to the inside of hood/fender assembly (Item 5).
Remove 2 hex bolts, lockwashers and flat washers (Item 6) at the front splash panel bracket (Item 7). The extension clip (Item 8) stays with the wiring harness, passenger side shown.

Remove 2 hex bolts and lockwashers (Item 9) securing the hood tilt assist spring bracket (Item 2) and remove hood tilt assist spring bracket and hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) from the hood/fender assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side hood/fender splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: 8200 Model Splash Panels - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) and hood tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2) in place on the inside of hood/fender assembly (Item 5) and install 2 hex bolts and lockwashers (Item 9). Tighten to finger tight, passenger side shown.

Position the front of the hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) in place at the front splash panel bracket (Item 7) and install the upper hex bolt, lockwasher and flat washer (Item 6), tighten to finger tight, passenger side shown.
Install the lower hex bolt, lockwasher and flat washer (Item 6) through the extension clip (Item 8) into the front splash panel bracket, tighten to finger tight, passenger side shown.
Install the double row of rivets (Item 3) attaching the hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) to the inside of hood/fender assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown.

Once the rivets (Item 3) have been installed, tighten the upper and lower hex bolts with lockwashers and flat washers (Item 6) at the front splash panel bracket (Item 7), passenger side shown. Tighten to 34 to 38 ft-lbs. (46 to 51 Nm).
Tighten the 2 hex bolts with lockwashers (Item 9) at hood tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2), passenger side shown. Tighten to 240 to 265 in-lbs. (27 to 30 Nm).
Hook the tilt assist spring cable assembly (Item 1) onto the hood tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2), passenger side shown.

Carefully tilt the hood to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the support and tilt assist spring assemblies, then attach the tilt assist spring cable assembly to the mounting bracket on the side of the radiator as follows.
Refer to Figure 47 for items in parentheses.

step2.para: Position the tilt assist spring cable clevis (Item 5) at the tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2) on the side of the radiator (Item 3) and install the retaining pin (Item 4), driver side shown.
Install the cotter pin (Item 1) (and washer, if so equipped) at the tilt assist spring cable bracket (Item 2), driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install the passenger side tilt assist spring cable assembly.

step1.para: Repeat procedure to install driver side hood/fender splash panel.
